contentMetadata.content:
{{more citations needed|date=August 2012}} '''Gener8Xion Entertainment, Inc.''' is a Christian [[independent film]] production company based in [[Hollywood, California]].{{Cite web|url=https://www.charismanews.com/us/51857-matthew-crouch-named-chairman-of-the-board-of-tbn|title=Matthew Crouch Named Chairman of the Board of TBN|last=TBN|website=Charisma News|language=en|access-date=2019-03-09}} The company is a spin off from [[Trinity Broadcasting Network]] (TBN).{{Cite web|url=https://deadline.com/2013/11/trinity-broadcasting-network-founder-paul-crouch-dead-645330/|title=R.I.P. TBN Founder Paul Crouch|author=|date=2013-11-30|website=Deadline|language=en|access-date=2019-03-09}} The company was led by [[Matt Crouch (TBN)]] until mid-2010.{{Cite news|url=https://www.nytimes.com/2012/05/05/us/tbn-fight-offers-glimpse-inside-lavish-tv-ministry.html|title=TBN Fight Offers Glimpse Inside Lavish TV Ministry|last=Eckholm|first=Erik|date=2012-05-04|work=The New York Times|access-date=2019-03-09|language=en-US|issn=0362-4331}} {{Infobox company |name =Gener8Xion Entertainment, Inc. |logo =Gener8Xion Logo.jpg |logo_size =216px |type =[[Corporation|Inc]] |foundation =1993 |founders =[[Matthew Crouch]] |location_city =[[Hollywood, California]] |location_country =[[United States]] |key_people =Richard J. Cook
([[Chief executive officer|CEO]] and [[Chairman]])
Sonny Lofbom ([[President (corporate title)|President]])
Stephan Blinn
(Chief Creative Officer) |industry =[[Christian film industry|Christian films]] |products =[[Film|Motion pictures]], [[television program]]s |homepage =[http://www.8X.com/ www.8X.com] }} == Filmography == *''[[The Omega Code]]'' (1999) *''[[Carman: The Champion]]'' (2001) *''[[Megiddo: The Omega Code 2]]'' (2001) *''[[One Night with the King]]'' (2006) *''[[Noëlle (film)|Noëlle]]'' (2007) (distributor) *''[[The Cross (2009 film)|The Cross]]'' (2009) *''[[Preacher's Kid (film)|Preacher's Kid]]'' (2010) == References == {{Reflist}} == External links == * [https://web.archive.org/web/20070210211916/http://www.8x.com/ Gener8Xion Entertainment, Inc.] {{Authority control}} [[Category:Film production companies of the United States]] [[Category:Companies based in Los Angeles County, California]] [[Category:Christian film production companies]] [[Category:Trinity Broadcasting Network]] {{US-film-company-stub}}
contentMetadata.text: Gener8Xion Entertainment, Inc. is a Christian independent film production company based in Hollywood, California. The company is a spin off from Trinity Broadcasting Network (TBN). The company was led by Matt Crouch (TBN) until mid-2010. The Omega Code (1999) Carman: The Champion (2001) Megiddo: The Omega Code 2 (2001) One Night with the King (2006) Noëlle (2007) (distributor) The Cross (2009) Preacher's Kid (2010) TBN. "Matthew Crouch Named Chairman of the Board of TBN". Charisma News. Retrieved 2019-03-09. "R.I.P. TBN Founder Paul Crouch". Deadline. 2013-11-30. Retrieved 2019-03-09. Eckholm, Erik (2012-05-04). "TBN Fight Offers Glimpse Inside Lavish TV Ministry". The New York Times. ISSN 0362-4331. Retrieved 2019-03-09. Gener8Xion Entertainment, Inc. v t e
